title: vEru tuNai
sahitya:
vEru tuNai Edunran vErimalar padamallAl
veyya pulan aindin vashamAi azhiyum Ezhaikku


anupallavi

  nIraNiya naNam koNDEn ninnaDiyAr kUTTuravai nanjupOl manam kaNDEn


caraNam    san mArgam enruNarndum shella manam virumbilEn
dun-mArgam enrarindum adai viTTu tirumbilEn
pon mEni karuNainidhi puraharanE shivaparanE
un padam aDaikkalam ulagu niRaiyum prabhO
